  Slimefun Resourcepack
</h1>
<p>

<div align="center">

[![Discord][discord-badge]][discord-invite]

<h3>

A simple remix & remake Slimefun Resourcepack<br />
Generated by [ItemsAdder][spigot-itemsadder]<br />
**Now available on [Modrinth][modrinth]!**

</h3>

<h4><b>
Warning: Most of the textures are from the internet, all right reserved to the original author.
</b></h4>

</div>

## üå† Recommand Mods

| Mod | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [CIT Resewn][modrinth-cit] | Support more custom item feature <br /> (ex `Armor Layer`) |
| [Slimefun Essentials][modrinth-slimefun-essentials] | Support EMI, REI, JEI recipes view and more!<br /> Checkout mod description to see. |

## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation

<details>
<summary>üéÆ Player</summary>

Download resourecpack on [Modrinth][modrinth], and load it at minecraft.

> ‚ÑπÔ∏è Note<br />
> Server owner must install `item-models.yml` on server to match up the items.

</details>

<details>
<summary>üíª Server Owner</summary>

- item-models installation
  1. Download `item-models.zip` at [Modrinth][modrinth]. <br />
     You can find it under the version tab and click a version <br/>
     Three files can be downloaded.
  2. Unzip `item-models.zip` to get `item-models.yml`.
  3. Place it under `plugins/Slimefun/`.

- ItemsAdder installation
  1. Download `ia-addons.zip` at [Modrinth][modrinth] <br />
     You can find it under the version tab and click a version <br/>
     Three files can be downloaded.
  2. Unzip `ia-addons.zip`, and place `contents` at `plugins/ItemsAdder`.
  3. Type `/iareload` to load new texture. <br />
     `/iazip` to zip up new assets.

</details>

## üö© Version Format

We are using Semantic Versioning v2 format.

Only some differences, like *Major* version won't be changed.

Format vMAJOR.MINOR.PATCH:

- **Major**: Won't be changed (will be changed if I want to redo ID range list)
- **Minor**: When changing or adding new textures
- **Patch**: When fixing, update path, mc version, etc.

## üìù Content and Information

There are still a lot of textures missing! Welcome to contribute more textures!

<details>
<summary>CIT Support List</summary>

- InfinityExpansion Armor
- Slimefun Armor
- ExtraGear Armor

</details>

<details>
<summary>Model ID Range</summary>

| Name | Range |
| --- | --- |
| Slimefun | 2200001 - 2200600 |
| InfinityExpansion | 2200601 - 2200679 |
| SlimyTreeTaps | 2200800 - 2200809 |
| LiteXpansion | 2200810 - 2200829 |
| ExoticGarden | 2200830 - 2201200 |
| ExtraGear | 2201201 - 2201270 |
| SimpleUtils | 2201270 - 2201279 |
| FluffyMachines | 2201280 - 2201300 |
| FoxyMachines | 2201301 - 2201400 |
| Bump | 2201401 - 2201470 |
| Supreme | 2201471 - 2202000 |
| SlimefunWarfare | 2202001 - 2202200 |
| Gastronomicon | 2203001 - 2203500 |

</details>
